info.title: ConsumptionManagementClient
info.description: Consumption management client provides access to consumption resources for Azure Enterprise Subscriptions.

tags.name: Budgets-Preview
tags.description: Perform CRUD (Create, Update, Read, Delete) operations on the budget entity at the Subscription scope.

get.description: Lists all budgets for a subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the budget for a subscription by budget name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: The operation to create or update a budget. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request mandatorily. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Budget operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: The operation to delete a budget.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available consumption REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The credit summary by billingAccountId and billingProfileId for given start and end date.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the events by billingAccountId and billingProfileId for given start and end date.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the lots by billingAccountId and billingProfileId for given start and end date.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Get pricesheet data for invoice id (invoiceName).

parameters.name: invoiceName
parameters.description: The name of an invoice resource.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: To get the progress of the operation, call GET operation on the URL in Azure-AsyncOperation header field.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Get pricesheet data for invoice id (invoiceName).

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: To get the progress of the operation, call GET operation on the URL in Azure-AsyncOperation header field.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the charges by billingAccountId for given start and end date. Start and end date are used to determine the billing period. For current month, the data will be provided from month to date. If there are no chages for a month then that month will show all zeroes.

parameters.name: $apply
parameters.description: May be used to group charges by properties/billingProfileId, or properties/invoiceSectionId.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the charges by billing profile id for given start and end date. Start and end date are used to determine the billing period. For current month, the data will be provided from month to date. If there are no chages for a month then that month will show all zeroes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the charges by invoice section id for given start and end date. Start and end date are used to determine the billing period. For current month, the data will be provided from month to date. If there are no chages for a month then that month will show all zeroes.

parameters.name: $apply
parameters.description: May be used to group charges by properties/productName.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

policies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment.

EnrollmentPolicies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment

reservedInstancesEnabled.description: The reserved instances flag for Enrollment

department.description: Associated department. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

enrollmentAccounts.description: Associated enrollment accounts. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

BillingAccountProperties.description: The properties of the billing account.

company.description: The Company this billing account belongs to.

address.description: The address associated with billing account.

defaultCurrency.description: The ISO currency, for example, USD.

country.description: The country associated with billing account.

invoiceSections.description: The invoiceSections associated to the billing account.

billingProfiles.description: The billing profiles associated to the billing account.

enrollmentDetails.description: The details about the associated legacy enrollment. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

departments.description: The departments associated to the enrollment.

enrollmentAccounts.description: The accounts associated to the enrollment.

BillingProfileProperties.description: The properties of the billing profile.

billingProfiles.description: The billing profiles associated to the billing account.

currency.description: The currency for the amount value.

DownloadUrl.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a an entity until the URL expires.

downloadUrl.description: The URL to the PDF file.

expiryTime.description: The time in UTC at which this download URL will expire.

BudgetsListResult.description: Result of listing budgets. It contains a list of available budgets in the scope provided.

category.description: The category of the budget, whether the budget tracks cost or something else.

amount.description: The total amount of cost to track with the budget

timeGrain.description: The time covered by a budget. Tracking of the amount will be reset based on the time grain.

timePeriod.description: Has start and end date of the budget. The start date must be first of the month and should be less than the end date. Budget start date must be on or after June 1, 2017. Future start date should not be more than three months. Past start date should  be selected within the timegrain period. There are no restrictions on the end date.

currentSpend.description: The current amount of cost which is being tracked for a budget.

notifications.description: Dictionary of notifications associated with the budget. Budget can have up to five notifications.

BudgetTimePeriod.description: The start and end date for a budget.

startDate.description: The start date for the budget.

endDate.description: The end date for the budget. If not provided, we default this to 10 years from the start date.

CurrentSpend.description: The current amount of cost which is being tracked for a budget.

amount.description: The total amount of cost which is being tracked by the budget.

unit.description: The unit of measure for the budget amount.

Notification.description: The notification associated with a budget.

enabled.description: The notification is enabled or not.

threshold.description: Threshold value associated with a notification. Notification is sent when the cost exceeded the threshold. It is always percent and has to be between 0 and 1000.

contactEmails.description: Email addresses to send the budget notification to when the threshold is exceeded.

contactRoles.description: Contact roles to send the budget notification to when the threshold is exceeded.

CreditSummaryProperties.description: The properties of the credit summary.

balanceSummary.description: Summary of balances associated with this credit summary.

ChargesListByBillingAccount.description: Result of listing charge summary by billing account. It contains a list of available change summaries in reverse chronological order by billing period.

value.description: The list of charge summary by billing account.

ChargesListByBillingProfile.description: Result of listing charge summary by billing profile. It contains a list of available change summaries in reverse chronological order by billing period.

value.description: The list of charge summary by billing profile.

ChargesListByInvoiceSection.description: Result of listing charge summary by invoiceSection. It contains a list of available change summaries in reverse chronological order by billing period.

value.description: The list of charge summary by invoiceSection.

ChargeSummaryByBillingAccount.description: A charge summary resource by billing account.

ChargeSummaryByBillingProfile.description: A charge summary resource by billing profile.

ChargeSummaryByInvoiceSection.description: A charge summary resource by invoiceSection.

ChargeSummaryProperties.description: The properties of the charge summary.

billingPeriodId.description: The id of the billing period resource that the usage belongs to.

billingAccountId.description: The id of the billing account resource that the charge belongs to.

billingProfileId.description: The id of the billing profile resource that the charge belongs to.

invoiceSectionId.description: The id of the invoice section resource that the charge belongs to.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: UsageDetail, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result of listing consumption operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of consumption operations supported by the Microsoft.Consumption resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

eTag.description: eTag of the resource. To handle concurrent update scenario, this field will be used to determine whether the user is updating the latest version or not.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2018-11-01-preview.
